MAN.TITLE: max_cap_path

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : row vector of integer numbers of the arcs of the path if it exists
: value of the capacity of the path

DESCRIPTION.P: max_cap_path returns the path with maximum capacity from node i to node j for the graph g if it exists and returns the empty vector [] otherwise.

The capacities of the edges are given by the element edge_max_cap of the graph list. If its value is not given (empty vector []), max_cap_path returns the empty vector []. The capacities must be strictly positive, i.e negative capacities are considered as equal to 0 (no capacity at all).
